name: Zoning order; appeal to circuit court
text:
Any final order of the department based upon this [chapter] may be appealed to the circuit court of the circuit in which the land in question is found.  The appeal shall be in accord with chapter 91 and the Hawaii rules of civil procedure. [L 1994, c 270, pt of §1]
 
       Zoning order; appeal to circuit environmental court.  [Section effective July 1, 2015.  For section effective until June 30, 2015, see above.]  Any final order of the department based upon this [chapter] may be appealed to the circuit environmental court of the circuit in which the land in question is found.  The appeal shall be in accord with chapter 91 and the Hawaii rules of civil procedure. [L 1994, c 270, pt of §1; am L 2014, c 218,  §8]
 
Rules of Court
 
  Appeal to circuit court, see HRCP rule 72.
